title: Who robbed the robins?
brief_description: A delightful animated story: A family of robins have their eggs stolen by another bird. Father robin hires a detective to recover their eggs. The eggs are returned safely to mother and father robin and the villain is taken into custody. The three eggs hatch and the robin family live happily ever after. Animation by H.J Whitaker. Music composed and orchestrated by Jose Norman. Designed by Alan Carter.
